section.label: Installing Preware
section.p: Expand the category that matches your operating system. Follow the simple and organised steps to install Preware.

substep.span: Put your device in Developer Mode
Press the third button on the right
Choose WebOS Internals Feed (Pre) or WebOS Internals Feed (Pixi) from the dropdown list at the top.
Select YES if requested to confirm install script execution.
To update Preware, simpy use Preware itself.
When you update the Preware, it will close itself when the update completes. Simply launch Preware again to begin using the new version.

section.label: Need Help or Want to Help Out?
section.p: You can chat with the developers on the Freenode IRC network.
